ru.bit.torrent

Class TorrentInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.bit.torrent.TorrentInfo

  • public class TorrentInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a data structure class that extracts basic information from a bencoded torrent metainfo file and stores it in public fields.  Note that this class only works for torrent metainfo files for a single-file torrent.
    Author:
    Robert Moore II

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.net.URL announce_url
      The base URL of the tracker for client scrapes.
      int file_length
      The length of the file in bytes.
      java.lang.String file_name
      The name of the file referenced in the torrent metainfo file.
      java.nio.ByteBuffer info_hash
      The SHA-1 hash of the bencoded form of the info dictionary from the torrent metainfo file.
      java.util.Map<java.nio.ByteBuffer,java.lang.Object> info_map
      The unbencoded info dictionary of the torrent metainfo file.  See http://www.bittorrent.org/beps/bep_0003.html for an explanation of what keys are available and how they map.
      static java.nio.ByteBuffer KEY_ANNOUNCE
      ByteBuffer to retrieve the announce URL from the metainfo dictionary.
      static java.nio.ByteBuffer KEY_INFO
      Key used to retrieve the info dictionary from the torrent metainfo file.
      static java.nio.ByteBuffer KEY_LENGTH
      Key used to retrieve the length of the torrent.
      static java.nio.ByteBuffer KEY_NAME
      Key used to retrieve the file name.
      static java.nio.ByteBuffer KEY_PIECE_LENGTH
      Key used to retrieve the default piece length.
      static java.nio.ByteBuffer KEY_PIECES
      Key used to retrieve the piece hashes.
      java.nio.ByteBuffer[] piece_hashes
      The SHA-1 hashes of each piece of the file.
      int piece_length
      The default length of each piece in bytes.  Note that the last piece may be irregularly-sized (less than the value of piece_length) if the file size is not a multiple of the piece size.
      byte[] torrent_file_bytes
      A byte array containing the raw bytes of the torrent metainfo file.
      java.util.Map<java.nio.ByteBuffer,java.lang.Object> torrent_file_map
      The base dictionary of the torrent metainfo file.  See http://www.bittorrent.org/beps/bep_0003.html for an explanation of what keys are available and how they map.

      Constructor and Description
      TorrentInfo(byte[] torrent_file_bytes)
      Creates a new TorrentInfo object from the specified byte array.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TorrentInfo

        public TorrentInfo(byte[] torrent_file_bytes)
            throws BencodingException
        Creates a new TorrentInfo object from the specified byte array. If the byte array is null or has a length of 0(zero), then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        torrent_file_bytes -
        Throws:
        BencodingException
